item.name: 2 de Mayo
item.comment: Game should be broken. If you are playing Spanish revolutionists gather them all in one place and run away from French soldiers. Probably always win.

item.name: 2019: The ARCTIC
item.comment: Good and original mechanic, interesting climate of war and politics around North Pole, nice board but poor pawns quality.

item.name: Abalone
item.comment: Mostly play with shop clients.

item.name: Ad Astra
item.comment: Chaotic, random, low plastic quality, much worse version of Settlers. Red metal, black metal - how are they called in rules?

item.name: Aether
item.comment: Very simple game. Similar to Samurai, but not so climatic.

item.name: Age of Steam
item.comment: Interesting game but I couldn't find anything original in it. Need to play more for rating.

item.name: Agricola
item.comment: Another multiplayer solitaire. Biurocratic final scoring. Having babies is too much powerful.

item.name: Alea Iacta Est
item.comment: The best dice game I've ever played. The only dice game where chooses are not obvious.

item.name: Awans: Zostań Marszałkiem Polski
item.comment: A bit better than War.

item.name: Backgammon
item.comment: boring random game

item.name: Battlestar Galactica
item.comment: Very good cooperative game. A bit too long and unfortunately with dice. Feelings are similar to SoC, but in BSG mechanic is a bit better.

item.name: Blefuj
item.comment: Little, fun and stupid game.

item.name: Blokus
item.comment: Mostly with shop clients

item.name: Blokus 3D
item.comment: Worse version of Pueblo

item.name: Boomerang
item.comment: Rules are nearly the same as in Lascaux. Smaller box and better graphics make game cheaper and better.

item.name: Canal Mania
item.comment: Train game mixed with Ticket to Ride. Interesting, but not for gamers neither for family.

item.name: Carcassonne
item.comment: solitaire playing included

item.name: Carrom
item.comment: very good dexterity game

item.name: Catan Card Game
item.comment: Too long for simple random game.

item.name: Cathedral
item.comment: Worse version of blokus.

item.name: Cavum
item.comment: In the game are so many scientific faults, that Cavum is not for geologists. Overcomplicated with weird scoring system and huge downtime.

item.name: Caylus
item.comment: multiplayer solitaire

item.name: Cephalopod
item.comment: Interesting logical game with many dices.

item.name: Chicago Express
item.comment: Simple auction game with low replayability.

item.name: Chinatown
item.comment: Something between Bohnansa and Traders of Genoa, but not so good as these two.

item.name: Condottiere
item.comment: too many special cards, snowball effect

item.name: Conflict of Heroes: Awakening the Bear! – Russia 1941-42
item.comment: boring and random

item.name: Conquest of Paradise
item.comment: Fully random broken mechanic

item.name: Cosmic Encounter
item.comment: Too big and expensive for silly game.

item.name: Crokinole
item.comment: worse version of Carrom

item.name: Cuba
item.comment: Beautyful and climatic game with two new very good mechanic: parlament and plantation

item.name: Cytadela
item.comment: The best psychological game.

item.name: Cywilizacja: Poprzez wieki
item.originalname: Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
item.comment: Long and complicated.

item.name: Czerwony Listopad
item.comment: Nothing interesting

item.name: Diamant
item.comment: Very simple, very random

item.name: Diamonds Club
item.comment: Very good and beautiful game with original mechanic.

item.name: Dixit
item.comment: My favourite party game.

item.name: Dominion
item.comment: A lot of cards, I do not feel climate of this game. Easy to chit during shuffle. Cards will ware out soon.Very replayable.

item.name: Drachen Wurf
item.comment: Similar to Pickomino (Polowanie na Robale), but better.

item.name: Dungeon Lords
item.comment: Too random for better rate.

item.name: The Dutch Golden Age
item.comment: Light fast game, but every player should have the same number of turns. Very good alternative for Monopoly.

item.name: Eclipse
item.comment: Do not play with more then 4 players.

item.name: Einauge sei wachsam!
item.comment: Really good game to play parents with children.

item.name: Erosion
item.comment: The best geological game ever. :)

item.name: Erosion
item.comment: Very interesting climate, but mechanic doesn't work well.

item.name: Eufrat i Tygrys
item.comment: the best game with building and destruction

item.name: Evo
item.comment: Very funny but game has snowball effect

item.name: Expedition
item.comment: The best geographical game which I know.

item.name: Fauna
item.comment: This game should be in every school. Perfect educational game which learn through fun.

item.name: Felix: The Cat in the Sack
FITS
item.comment: 100% multiplayer solitaire. 100% tetris. Zero interaction.

item.name: Flussfieber
item.comment: Interesting, fast, fun. I want to play next time, but my rating can only go down.

item.name: Fluxx
item.comment: Fluxx is a game with big downtime, which comes from basic rule. It should be: play 1, take 1.

item.name: Futbol Ligretto
item.comment: Party game that goes very good with two players.

item.name: Galaxy Trucker
item.comment: Cosmic fun!

item.name: Galaxy Trucker: The Big Expansion
item.comment: More components, more fun.

item.name: Genua
item.comment: Great game with real trading.

item.name: Ghost Stories
item.comment: 1 player game which feign a multiplayer. Good graphics but very random.

item.name: Gipsy King
item.comment: Very good logical game with appropriate theme.

item.name: Glik
item.comment: I have homemade version. It is much better then published.

item.name: Der Goldene Kompass
item.comment: Interesting game with original mechanic. I recommend to try.

item.name: El Grande
item.comment: Playable only with 4 od 5.

item.name: Hamburgum
item.comment: The best Mac Gerdts game

item.name: Hanafuda
item.comment: A bit similar to Lost Cities, but longer and less intuitive. With some home rules (taking cards from deck to hand, taking three cards from one month) you can improve game to strategic version.

item.name: Hare & Tortoise
item.comment: Huge advantage of first player. Too much aritmethical for children.

item.name: Le Havre
item.comment: Too long and overcomplicated. I will never play this with my wife.

item.name: Hawaii
item.comment: Too many rules for so simple game. A hut which gives 2 points for every token with spears seems too powerful. If so, my rating go down.

item.name: Himalaya
item.comment: Simple rules, brilliant mechanic, my favourite family game.

item.name: Himalaya: The 5-6 Player Expansion
item.comment: Must have, Himalaya works best with 4 or 5 players.

item.name: Hive
item.comment: Looking for better opponents

item.name: Honor of the Samurai
item.comment: broken game, long, you win if other players will not have a card to stop you

item.name: Hooop!
item.comment: Beautiful children game but with kingmaking effect. Best with two.

item.name: Horror w Arkham
item.comment: I want to play more.

item.name: In the Shadow of the Emperor
In the Year of the Dragon
Jambo
item.comment: Very good trading game for two!

item.name: Junta
item.comment: Excellent game, but too long for me.

item.name: Kachina
item.comment: Very good tile lying game. A bit better than Carcassonne. I like the climate, but I don't like the smell of box.

item.name: Kazaam
item.comment: Awful

item.name: Keltis
item.comment: Other version of Lost Cities. Mechanicly better, but less climatic.

item.name: Kheops
item.comment: Game for two computers without computer.

item.name: Kraby
item.comment: The best Folko game. Fast, simple with a lot of decisions. Very good artwork. Great family game.

item.name: Lascaux
item.comment: Boring and random

item.name: Last Night on Earth: The Zombie Game
item.comment: One of the worst game I have even played. Extremaly boriny. Long and very random. You could know that you lose in the half of play.

item.name: The Little Prince: Make Me a Planet
Livingstone
item.comment: Fine mechanic, but zero climate.

item.name: Loopin' Louie
item.comment: Much depends from who you play with. It could be fantastic or boring.

item.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game
Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation (Deluxe Edition)
Mancala
item.comment: home made version

item.name: Manoeuvre
item.comment: In feelings very similar to Memior'44, but worse. Poor quality of boards and dices, too much random.

item.name: Marrakech
item.comment: Filler. Final scoring depends on giving money for treading carpets, but this situation should occur offen.

item.name: Mastermind
item.comment: It is rather a puzzle not a game. One player during whole game have nothing to do.

item.name: Mech Wars
item.comment: Good, but wasted idea. Poor realization.

item.name: Memory
item.comment: First game I could and like to play with my daughter.

item.name: Merchants & Marauders
item.comment: Longer and overcomplicated version of Pirate's Cove.

item.name: Mesopotamia
item.comment: Cards are too powerful and create kingmaking situation at the end. It does not metter if you build better then others, because you will be destoy by cards.

item.name: Metropolys
item.comment: Innovative bidding mechanic. Colours of players are choosen not very good.

item.name: Mexica
item.comment: The best game from Kramer mask trilogy. Building regions is something hard to made, but in Mexica it works perfect.

item.name: Miasta i Rycerze z Catanu
item.comment: Better then normal Settlers but much longer.

item.name: Mr. Jack
item.comment: It is not boring, but I do not like this game, because always loose.

item.name: Niagara
item.comment: Very innovative, logical, climatic and loved by children.

item.name: Ninja Versus Ninja
item.comment: Stupid, but sometimes could be fun.

item.name: Olympus
item.comment: Olympus has nice cards artwork and theme, but contains snowball effect. Temple of Ares is too strong and makes game inbalanced.

item.name: Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
item.comment: This creative game excite imagination.

item.name: Orzeł i Gwiazda
item.comment: Very good game. That's eurogamer opinion.

item.name: Osadnicy z Catanu
item.comment: My first modern boardgame. Still like to play

item.name: Osadnicy z Catanu - Dodatek dla 5-6 graczy
Der Palast von Eschnapur
item.comment: It is easier to stop other players then do something good for yourself. You can choose who will not win.

item.name: Pandemic
item.comment: 1-player game which feign multiplayer game. The worst cooperative game I have ever played.

item.name: Pędzące żółwie
item.comment: My favourite children game. Very fun also for adults. Favourite game of my 4 year old daughter. We are counting turtles and learning colours.

item.name: Phoenicia
item.comment: Some mechanics are taken from Caylus, aucion from Power Grid, so this is not an innovative game. Phoenicia has snowball effect.

item.name: Pick & Pack
item.comment: very good innovative logical game

item.name: Pickpocket
item.comment: Simplify version of Ra. Very random. If you win first round, probably you will win all game.

item.name: The Pillars of the Earth: Builders Duel
The Pillars of the Earth: Expansion Set
Pluszaki Rozrabiaki - opowieści z podróży
item.comment: Very good children game which merge rarely found pair of mechanics - memory and storytelling. My 4 and 1/2 yo daughter have much fun playing this. Unfortunately, it could have more pictures.

item.name: Podróż do wnętrza ziemi
item.originalname: Journey to the Center of the Earth

item.name: Poison
item.comment: Easy, Fast and fun. Really good Knizia.

item.name: Pojedynek: Dynamiczna gra szlachecka
item.comment: Waste of time and money.

item.name: Pola Naftowe
item.comment: Waste of time and money.

item.name: Polarity
item.comment: fascinating magnetic strategy game

item.name: Power Grid: China/Korea
item.comment: On Korea map changes are small. Two resource markets is the only but good innovation. China map has the most different rules. Very long start and other way of power plant distibution.

item.name: Power Grid: Factory Manager
item.comment: Younger brother of Power Grid. Faster, with more counting, same fun.

item.name: Prime Suspect: Tajemnice Vileburga
item.comment: Climatic, but poor quality. mechanically broken, playable only 12 times.

item.name: The Princes of Machu Picchu
item.comment: Fast economy game with super theme and beautiful wooden elements. Unfortunately board is poorly desinged.

item.name: Puerto Rico
item.comment: Game not in my style.

item.name: Queen's Necklace
item.comment: Very good and beautyful typical Faidutti style game.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy
item.comment: At the biginning I was thinking that RftG is a multiplayer solitaire, but after 10 plays I want to play more. Now I played over 200 times and I'm still finding new strategies.

item.name: Race for the Galaxy: Rebel vs Imperium
Race for the Galaxy: The Brink of War
Race for the Galaxy: The Gathering Storm
Reef Encounter
item.comment: This is a game with the best theme for me.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
Rock the Beat
item.comment: Good party game for many people.

item.name: Roll Through the Ages: The Bronze Age
item.comment: Good dice game, but I see one obvious strategy - build cities as fast as you can.

item.name: Royal Palace
item.comment: One of the best games released at Essen 2008. Game with perfect mechanic. Light brainburner with many ways to win and great replayability.

item.name: Santiago
item.comment: There is something mechanically wrong in this game.

item.name: Die Säulen der Erde: das Kartenspiel
Scrabble
item.comment: always win with a person who knows less words, always lose with a person who knows more words

item.name: Seeland
item.comment: Clever and original rondel mechanic. Beautiful graphics. Very good game but a bit to much counting. 5+4+7+2+3+1=? Numbers could be lower - from 0 to 3 not to 7. Never play random version.

item.name: Shadows over Camelot
item.comment: Good climatic game, but playable only with people who feels this climate.

item.name: Sid Meier's Civilization: Gra Planszowa
item.originalname: Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game

item.name: Snow Tails
item.comment: Similar to Fast Flowing Forest Fellers but more complicated and less fun.

item.name: Space Alert
item.comment: The best game I have ever played. The only which I give more then 9. Very cilmatic and beautiful. Everyone should play it and teach team working and how to behave in stressful situation.

item.name: StarCraft: The Board Game
item.comment: boring

item.name: Steam: Wyścig do Bogactwa
item.comment: The best train game I've ever played. Better than Age of Steam, because math operations are simplier and strategic possibilities are the same. Less random than AoS.

item.name: Stone Age
item.comment: Very climatic and with great graphic but a bit too long.

item.name: Stronghold
item.comment: Irritating game

item.name: Super Farmer
item.comment: Random children game.

item.name: Tàin
item.comment: Very boring. Game looks deep, but it is a depth of random.

item.name: Thor
item.comment: Brilliant and beautiful simple card game.

item.name: Thurn und Taxis
item.comment: The beautist board game with fast and gorgeous mechanic.

item.name: Thurn und Taxis: Glanz und Gloria
item.originalname: Thurn and Taxis: Power and Glory
item.comment: Better then normal T&T

item.name: Ticket to Ride: Märklin
item.comment: The best Ticket to Ride version, because there are 3 ways to get points instead of 2 in other versions.

item.name: Tikal
item.comment: Beautiful and climatic game with great mechanic. The only game which I know, where players determine distance between fields.

item.name: Tiki Topple
item.comment: Game where moves are out of control of any player.

item.name: Tinners' Trail
item.comment: Everything is OK with Tinners' Trail exept random tin and copper prices.

item.name: Trias
item.comment: brilliant mechanic of crushing Pangea

item.name: Tribune: Primus Inter Pares
item.comment: Play only for points. This version of rules is the best. Good theme, right mechanic.

item.name: Turbo Taxi
item.comment: Galaxy Trucker for kids.

item.name: Ubongo Mini
item.comment: So simple, that I will not play this anymore.

item.name: Ubongo: Das Duell
item.comment: Better then normal Ubongo.

item.name: Vinhos
item.comment: Overcomplicated. Some rules could be simply omitted without loosing deepness.

item.name: War of the Ring Collector's Edition
Warhammer: Invasion
item.comment: Very boring. I don't playing games for reading cards.

item.name: Wasabi!
item.comment: Random, random, random.

item.name: Wiedźmin: Przygodowa Gra Karciana
item.originalname: The Witcher: The Adventure Card Game

item.name: WildLife
item.comment: Interesting but mechanically similar to Tikal and Mexica. I like games with ancient animals, but Wildlife has wrong theme.

item.name: Wilki i owce
item.comment: Best with 3 players

item.name: Witchcraft
item.comment: First player advantage. Mechanic similar to Neuroshima Hex. Only for 2 players.

item.name: Wypas
item.comment: random, in game pay off harm the worse player, game rules does not explain one very importent phase.

item.name: Wysokie Napięcie
item.comment: After ideal game Power Grid fall down in my opinion by 2, now back up.

item.name: Wysokie Napięcie - Europa Centralna / Beneluks
item.comment: Central Europe is my favorite map. There is a lot of place to block other players and uranium is useful. Rules changes (Wien, not building nuclear plants) are inperceptible.

item.name: Władca pierścieni - Konfrontacja
item.originalname: Lord of the Rings: The Confrontation
item.comment: My favourite game in Middle-earth.

item.name: Zaginione Miasta
item.comment: The best game to play with my wife.

item.name: Zendo
item.comment: Master, nature of Buddha is hidden clever.

item.name: Zimna wojna 1945-1989
item.comment: Great game about very interesting time in history.

item.name: Zlot Czarownic
item.comment: Very funny but not for everyone.
